name: rock adventure
description:
A young elf gril from a small village which far away from cities. One day she find out she have some speical abillity which can move rocks as her wish. After heard the suggest from village head she decide to start her adventure.

Features:

-A adventure and growth of an elf gril

-Beat enemies to go through the story

-Learning from adventure, it may have some new skills

Release Date:

15th of November 2019

Plaform:

PC Windows XP
